rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment is a technical description. No high-potency verbs or potent metaphors used.
Technical description, lacks a moderate verb paired with explicit scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports viral characteristics without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation without an explicit calming cue.
